events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will begin the review process shortly.
Your application has been categorised under the Engineering department for further consideration by the technical team.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your profile to guide you through the hiring process for the software developer role.
You completed the initial screening interview where we discussed your background and relevant software engineering experience.
You responded promptly, confirming your availability for the upcoming technical interview and expressing enthusiasm for the role.
The technical interview has been scheduled for May 15 at 10:00 AM UTC to assess your development and problem-solving skills.
You successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong knowledge in software engineering and coding.
Your HR interview has been scheduled for May 18 at 2:00 PM UTC to discuss company culture and benefits.
You completed the HR interview and received positive feedback regarding your fit for the companyâ€™s values and team dynamic.
We have extended a formal offer for you to join our engineering team as a Software Developer with a competitive compensation package.
You provided positive feedback on the offer and showed eagerness to contribute your skills to the engineering projects.
You formally accepted the offer and are excited to join the team as a Software Engineer starting next month.
Your onboarding process has been initiated, including training schedules, equipment setup, and team introductions.
The hiring process is now complete. Welcome aboard as an official member of our engineering team.
